content.question: The woman gives the man directions to a place that is located

choices.label: next door to the pharmacy on the right
across the street after passing the coffeehouse
next door to the coffeehouse on the left

content.answer: across the street after passing the coffeehouse

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
